name: Riser
description:
What am I doing?
Hike up the mountain and gather as much treasure as you can, simple right? Well, the twist is, the more money you have, the faster the screen scrolls, yeah, good luck with that when you have around $15,000.

Controls:
You can use either:
WASD and mouse clicks or Arrow Keys and Z & X

Abilities & Upgrades:

If you manage to gather enough coins in a run, you can buy a couple of upgrades (in this version just 2 are unlocked). Also, you may come across a few temporary abilities within the runs themselves.

Bugs?

Poke me over on my Twitter and let me know!

Hope you enjoy my first proper game-jam submission and essentially my first ever game release!
